official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1989 to the Legal Services Corporation to carry out the Legal Services Corporation Act, and for other purposes.
short_title: Legal Services Corporation Authorization Act of 1988

summary.text: Legal Services Corporation Authorization Act of 1988 - Authorizes appropriations for FY 1989 for the Legal Services Corporation. Sets forth restrictions on the use of such funds.
